markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cackle](/Feats.aspx?ID=4992) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 186 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your patron’s power fills you with confidence, letting you sustain a magical working even as a quick burst of laughter leaves your lips. You learn the [_cackle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1875) hex.
name: Cackle
